text: Hey Luke, Is social login functionality or integration available with HubSpot ?
<@UJ2QKB849> Social Login is not available through HubSpot's user access feature.

These KB Article should help with using HubSpots user system if they are also an enterprise level customer with the CMS as Luke metioned: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cms-pages-editor/control-audience-access-to-pages>
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cms-pages-editor/understand-private-content-access-for-contacts>
Does anyone know if you can clone an entire folder from one portal to another?
just select all the templates in the folder and it will copy the folder structure as well
